      • emit

        public final void emit(Object tag,
                       Object event)
        Description copied from interface: RHub
        Manually emit an event to a specific Proxy. In order to prohibit this behaviour override this to ignore or throw an exception or RHub.canTriggerEmit(Object) to return false.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
